name: Tax administration special fund; established
text:
There is established a tax administration special fund into which shall be deposited fees collected under sections 235-20, 235-110.9, and 235-110.91.  The moneys in the fund shall be expended by the department to offset the costs associated with:



	(1)	Issuing comfort letters;
	(2)	Issuing certificates under section 235-110.9; and
	(3)	Issuing certificates under section 235-110.91. [L 2004, c 215, pt of §3]
